trans-unit.source: Learn how to launch, suspend, and resume your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) DirectX app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to launch, suspend, and resume your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) DirectX app.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to launch, suspend, and resume your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) DirectX app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to launch, suspend, and resume your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) DirectX app.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to define the activation experience for a UWP DirectX app.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to define the activation experience for a UWP DirectX app.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to save important system state and app data when the system suspends your UWP DirectX app.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to save important system state and app data when the system suspends your UWP DirectX app.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to restore important application data when the system resumes your UWP DirectX app.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to restore important application data when the system resumes your UWP DirectX app.
